sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { UserGroupIcon, BriefcaseIcon, BuildingOfficeIcon, ClipboardDocumentListIcon, ChartBarIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); // Mock data - replace with actual API calls const stats = [ { name: 'Total Users', value: '1,234', change: '+12%', changeType: 'positive', icon: UserGroupIcon }, { name: 'Active Jobs', value: '567', change: '+8%', changeType: 'positive', icon: BriefcaseIcon }, { name: 'Companies', value: '89', change: '+5%', changeType: 'positive', icon: BuildingOfficeIcon }, { name: 'Applications', value: '2,345', change: '+15%', changeType: 'positive', icon: ClipboardDocumentListIcon } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'user_registration', message: 'New user registered: John Doe (Recruiter)', time: '2 minutes ago' }, { id: 2, type: 'job_posted', message: 'New job posted: Senior React Developer', time: '5 minutes ago' }, { id: 3, type: 'application_submitted', message: 'New application for Frontend Developer position', time: '10 minutes ago' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Admin Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}!

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (

{stat.name}

{stat.value}

{stat.change} from last month
); })}
{/* Quick Actions */}
{/* Recent Activities */}

Recent Activities

{recentActivities.map((activity) => (

{activity.message}

{activity.time}

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* System Status */}

System Status

Database: Online
API: Healthy
Email Service: Warning
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
